alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT VICTORIA COUNTY THROUGH 815 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem, or 10 miles west of Edna, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Guadalupe, Fordtran, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Dacosta, Wood Hi, Mission Valley, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Victoria Regional Airport, Telferner, Ball Airport Area, and Downtown Victoria. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 622 and 644. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 582. US Highway 87 between mile markers 796 and 822. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
